scenes.background: Bob leans back in his chair with a thoughtful expression.
scenes.description: Alright, lets brainstorm a hybrid plan. Any ideas on how to start?

options.text: We could have a short outdoor activity followed by a casual dinner.
options.analysis: You suggested a balanced plan, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we should ask everyone for their preferences and plan accordingly.
options.analysis: You focused on inclusivity by suggesting to consider everyone's preferences, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: An outdoor activity followed by a formal dinner might appeal to everyone.
options.analysis: You proposed combining both activities, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
